name: Imagine Champions Rider 3D
description: The first authentic horse game for the Nintendo 3DS system, 'Imagine Champions Rider' 3D invites players to care for more than 15 realistic horses, ride them and train them for world-class performance. Imagine Champion Rider 3D fully leverages the Nintendo 3DS features with the most realistic visuals for a horse game yet, including 3D horses, textures and beautiful environments, as well as StreetPass sharing and more.
